vsParam:
Uh? Escha, are you practicing alchemy?
You have knitted brows...

Ah! [px], and you guys!
Y-you guys saw that?

Hmm. Do you encounter any difficulty?
... Huh?

*Boo-hoo*... How could the operations be so different,
all the syntheses are done in the alchemical Cauldron...

Why other students learning alchemy could complete
these complicated operations so easily...
Uh? They are not complicated, are they?

They are completely different!
A far cry from those in my world...

Boo-hoo...
Is it because I'm too useless...

D-don't get so upset.
After all, it's alchemy in another world, right?

I mean, Escha. What on earth are the differences between
alchemy here and the one you've learned?

Hmm... According to my way, I just grab a bunch of
ingredients and put them in the cauldron, and stir.

I'm not used to this preparation method of following recipes
which even stipulate the specific amount of every component...

But I think it's more impressive for you to synthesize items
just by grabbing a bunch and putting them in the cauldron... Hmm...

Er... What's wrong?
Is there something behind me...

Ah, no! I'm so curious!
Escha's tail is moving, right!?

Hmm, in fact, I'm attracted by it, too...
Your tail... Were you born with it?

Ha-ha, of course not!
My mom made it for me.

Escha's mother? I remember that you said
your mother taught you alchemy, right?
Does this mean, this tail was made by alchemy!?

Make one for me, [px]!
I also want a tail!

Me, too! First we need ingredients, right?
Er... Fur is all we need, huh?

Alright~ Let's go collect some fur!
[px], here we go!

Hmm, uh, I mean...
Ah, please wait!

Well, this monster seems very suitable!
So fluffy. Your fur is mine now!

Hmm, uh, please be careful.
Don't get hurt!

Successfully obtained the fur! And succeeded in synthesis
of the tail! But...

... It doesn't move, the tail made by [px].
Hmm, what's the difference... Escha, do you know it?

Er... I have no idea
how this tail was made, either.
And I don't know why it moves.

Well... That's unfortunate.
But this tail is also kawaii. I'll treasure it â™ª

It's just, I have no chance to experience
a tail that moves before [px] makes one...

Uh? Ah! N-not this one!
I am not giving it to anyone!

Ah! Don't run away, Escha!
I will not rob you. Just let me touch it!
